# cohesivenet_vns3_https_certs (Resource)

Uploads and install a new license upgarde file on the VNS3 Controller.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cohesivenet_vns3_license_upgrade" "upgrade" {
  license_upgrade_key = "/path/to/license/file"
  clientpack_ips = "100.127.255.26,100.127.255.27,100.127.255.28,100.127.255.29,100.127.255.30"
  manager_ips = "100.127.255.252,100.127.255.253"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `license_upgrade_key` (String) Path to license upgrade supplied by Cohesive Networks
- `clientpack_ips` (String) CommaComma separated list of new clientpack ips to be allocated
- `manager_ips` (String) CommaComma separated list of new clientpack ips to be allocated

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
